dict.string: StepsTracker sends you encouraging notifications when you reach your daily step goals and helpful reminders to stay active throughout the day.
StepsTracker accesses your device's motion sensors to accurately count your steps and provide real-time progress tracking toward your daily fitness goals.
StepsTracker reads your step data from HealthKit to provide comprehensive step tracking, daily progress monitoring, and weekly statistics to help you maintain an active lifestyle.
StepsTracker updates your step data in HealthKit to ensure accurate synchronization across all your health and fitness apps.
